cards.example: 我每天早上起床以后先刷牙。
cards.examplePinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang qǐchuáng yǐhòu xiān shuāyá.
cards.exampleTranslation: Every morning after I get up, I brush my teeth first.
I have no way to help you.
Mom is preparing breakfast in the kitchen.
Do you eat breakfast every day?

cards.examplePinyin: Nǐ yào hē kāfēi háishi chá?
cards.exampleTranslation: Do you want to drink coffee or tea?

cards.definition: to go out; to leave the house
cards.examplePinyin: Wǒ bā diǎn chūmén qù gōngsī.
cards.exampleTranslation: I leave the house at eight o'clock to go to the office.

cards.definition: to go to work; to start work
cards.exampleTranslation: Dad goes to work every morning.

cards.definition: to be late; to arrive late
cards.examplePinyin: Rúguǒ zǒu de màn, jiù huì chídào.
cards.exampleTranslation: If you walk slowly, you'll be late.
